title: OP.GG Replays
body:
Is anyone else having issues with running OP.GG replays? I continuously get "Spectator server data request failed. The game will now exit."

Not sure if it's just my client or other people are also having the same issue.

replies.body: I've been having the same problem. Dunno how to fix it.
Is this really the place to go for a third-party program? I wouldn't be able to offer any help in regards to that.
What I'm suggesting is that they go to OP.GG's forums equivalent and try searching for help there. They might have more luck.
yes, i have been having the exact same problem. i tried reinstalling the client however it didn't fix the issues.
